snippet.title: Shrek Playtime is Ogre
snippet.description:
Time for some extreme Shrek action!

So, my friend wanted me to make a Shrek game. It was meant to be a joke, but then it kinda evolved into a serious thing.

If possible, I recommend the Steam Workshop version! It has a lot of fixed bugs!
Download here:
http://gamejolt.com/games/arcade/shrek-playtime-is-ogre/45591/

**I do not own the characters! All content of this game belongs to their rightful owners!**
